mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAVI_BODY (MEMBERNUM, MEMBERID, BODYDATE, BODYWEIGHT, BODYWEEK, MEMBERRATE) VALUES(BODY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId} , SYSDATE , #{bodyWeight}, (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'IW'))), #{memberRate})
mapper.select: SELECT (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'IW'))) FROM DUAL
SELECT BODYWEIGHT FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND BODYWEEK = #{thisWeek} ORDER BY MEMBERNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM =1
SELECT BODYWEIGHT FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND BODYWEEK = #{lastWeek} ORDER BY MEMBERNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM =1
SELECT MEMBERID, TOTALRATE FROM (SELECT MEMBERID, SUM(MEMBERRATE) TOTALRATE FROM DAVI_BODY GROUP BY MEMBERID ORDER BY 2) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT SUM(MEMBERRATE) FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID= #{memberId} AND BODYWEEK= (CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'IW'))) - 1 GROUP BY MEMBERID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_BODY ORDER BY BODYDATE DESC) WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND TO_CHAR(BODYDATE,'MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM-DD')
SELECT MEMBERRATE FROM (SELECT * FROM DAVI_BODY ORDER BY BODYDATE DESC) WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND TO_CHAR(BODYDATE,'MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM-DD')

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'MM'), '0') BODYMONTH, TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'DD') BODYDAY, BODYWEIGHT, MEMBERRATE FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND LTRIM(TO_CHAR(BODYDATE, 'MM'), '0') = #{searchMonth} ORDER BY BODYDATE

SELECT M.MEMBERHEIGHT HEIGHT, B.BODYWEIGHT WEIGHT, M.MEMBERRESOLUTION RESOLUTION, M.MEMBERGOALWEIGHT GOAL FROM DAVI_MEMBER M, (SELECT * FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE MEMBERID=#{memberId} ORDER BY BODYDATE DESC) B WHERE M.MEMBERID = B.MEMBERID AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),'DD') LASTDAY, COUNT(MEMBERID) ATTENDRATE FROM DAVI_BODY WHERE TO_CHAR(BODYDATE,'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND MEMBERID = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM DAVI_RECIPE WHERE RECIPEMORNING = #{recipeMorning}
